content.text: Match ends, Barcelona B 3, Recreativo 1.

Substitution, Barcelona B. Sergi Juste replaces Patric.

Goal!  Barcelona B 3, Recreativo 1. Pedro Ríos (Recreativo) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Rubén Mesa.
Substitution, Recreativo. Manuel Molina replaces Jesús Vázquez.
Goal!  Barcelona B 3, Recreativo 0. Juan Cámara (Barcelona B) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Munir El Haddadi following a fast break.
